predicate.note: Frames file for 'restart' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. Comparison with 'start'.

example.name: passive
example.text: The Belgian computer system finally was repaired and restarted [*-2] on Tuesday of this week , with the aid of Toronto Stock Exchange officials who [*T*-1] developed the system .
example.arg: with the aid of Toronto Stock Exchange officials who [*T*-1] developed the system

example.name: transitive
example.text: She worked part-time as a consultant and wrote a book , but never restarted her high-powered legal career .
